title: Bug 109718: Tips shown in one line instead of expected format when large content is put in text item
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTER THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should show in the given format.
Actual Result: The tips show in one line.
OB:
When large content is put in a text item, the tips shown appear in one line instead of the expected format.
MINOR ENHANCEMENTS: 
32.1 - Provide property group information on ElementDefn class
32.2 - Complete the TODO tasks
32.3 - Review result
32.4 - Message file enhancement
Currently, we store the error message for exceptions in the message.property file. Some of the error messages are duplicate.
EB: The tips should show the content in the expected format, even when large content is put in a text item.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Put large content in a text item.
3. Save the changes.
4. Put the mouse on the text item and observe the tips.

Expected result: The tips should show the content in the given format.
Actual result: The tips show the content in one line.
